title: The brazen age the first act containing, the death of the centaure Nessus, the second, the tragedy of Meleager: the third the tragedy of Iason and Medea. The fourth. Vulcans net the fifth. The labours and death of Hercules: written by Thomas Heywood.
author: Heywood, Thomas, d. 1641.
publisher: Printed by Nicholas Okes, for Samuel Rand dwelling neere Holborne-Bridge,
notes: Cf. Folger catalogue. which gives signatures: A²  B-L⁴.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
